snippet: I was working in Paris, and one day a colleague asked if I’d like to go to dinner with a longtime friend of his: Ray Bradbury.
abstract: Henry Fountain recalls sharing a dinner in Paris with author Ray Bradbury.
lead_paragraph: I was working in Paris, and one day a colleague asked if I’d like to go to dinner with a longtime friend of his: Ray Bradbury.

headline.seo: A Martian Joined Ray Bradbury and Me for Dinner in Paris
headline.main: A Martian Joined Ray Bradbury and Me for Dinner in Paris
headline.print_headline: A Martian Joined Ray Bradbury and Me for Dinner in Paris
